name: Devcontainers Repository
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y bash git curl && curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | tee /usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg > /dev/null && echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg] https://cli.github.com/packages stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null && apt-get update && apt-get install -y gh
